history.content:
Each class' grade will be listed next to the class name under the My Academics tab on CalCentral when it comes out.

----

Actually it's a little more complicated than that. I have some classes with grades already out but they're not visible from just the My Academics page. From the My Academics page you have to specifically click on the Fall 2016 heading, which will take you to a page that lists your classes with a GPA calculator on the right. If classes have reported final grades, instead of a dropdown menu it will have your final grade for that class there.

---

As of today, it will always be on the main My Academics page. Second student response above is no longer completely true at this time of posting.

Each class' grade will be listed next to the class name under the My Academics tab on CalCentral when it comes out.

----

Actually it's a little more complicated than that. I have some classes with grades already out but they're not visible from just the My Academics page. From the My Academics page you have to specifically click on the Fall 2016 heading, which will take you to a page that lists your classes with a GPA calculator on the right. If classes have reported final grades, instead of a dropdown menu it will have your final grade for that class there.

---

As of today, it will always be on the main My Academics page. Second student response above is no longer completely true.

Each class' grade will be listed next to the class name under the My Academics tab on CalCentral when it comes out.

----

Actually it's a little more complicated than that. I have some classes with grades already out but they're not visible from just the My Academics page. From the My Academics page you have to specifically click on the Fall 2016 heading, which will take you to a page that lists your classes with a GPA calculator on the right. If classes have reported final grades, instead of a dropdown menu it will have your final grade for that class there.
Each class' grade will be listed next to the class name under the My Academics tab on CalCentral when it comes out.

Now that the campus has switched to the SIS system, is there a way to see if final grades have been posted? In BearFacts we could go to "Current Term Grades" to see this, but I'm not sure what the equivalent in the SIS system is.
history.subject: Where can we find final grades?
